title: My USB Preferences are all grayed out when I go to connect to the PC....I cant set it to file trax
content: My USB Preferences are all grayed out  when I go to connect to the PC....I cant set it to  file transfer files or see PC or android auto...I have two pixel xl and the one 64 gb can but the main one I use  128 gb pixel xl wont and I spent 2 hours with google chat to no  resolve other day thinking it was only android auto but its   More I Know Now...What is my options to fix this? Here is a picture of the 64 gb that works right and then the 128 gb that stays grayed out.....
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
